byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: The continued turmoil in the stock market makes a tax-free spinoff of the unit, WPX Energy, a more attractive alternative, the company says.
snippet: The continued turmoil in the stock market makes a tax-free spinoff of the unit, WPX Energy, a more attractive alternative, the company says.

headline.main: Williams Calls Off I.P.O. of Exploration Unit
